wut

a


scam
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
no
Nice scam :P
yea this is a scam, didnt work for my mate whos phone i used
takes up to 24h , but this does work I tried it, too
For Visual Clarity Adjustments, why didn't you fix Talon's W range indicator? {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
What have you done to Aatrox :l
Aatrox is dead set aids now..... soooo bad.Done a "great job" on this one riot {{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}

Couldn't agree more. He was playable before but incredibly situational, but insane if he got ahead. Now he has absolutely no power in the early, which gets him no where whe it gets to mid/late. So upset

Can we talk about the elephant in the room? {{summoner:3}} As a Volibear Support exhaust was my bread and butter for a good chase down.  Since when was exhaust only supposed to be a defensive summoners spell, I thought it was always a two sided coin. Now you halves its usefulness.  Thanks Rito

Riot....Riot riot riot riot.....you screwed up big time with {{champion:266}} how the hell did you think that changing his passive like that would be a good idea? He's too squishy now and can't do shit early game anymore. Revert his passive back to the way it was. But other than that his other tweaks were some good thinking. Leave his other abilities to have no health cost.
at least sions getting some attention {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

AATROX E SHOULD BE DOUBLE DAMAGE, it's his only poke, it looks like it should HURT. AATROX was meant to be a more powerful demon like fallen angel, however your E has made him look like a weak piece cof garbage. This is why aatrox has bad laning phase. Please give aatrox a more powerful E.
Glad to see Aatrox getting some work! Will have to see how he plays out in the next few patches.
Obviously it's going to end well, his new passive sucks ass
rito can you fix warwicks w sometimes it doesnt work i will be walking towards the enemy and the trail wont give me the move speed and i will cycle between animations looking like an idiot
im loving the new stoneborn pack, good job riot {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
This was an interesting {{champion:266}} change {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}

how about instead of killing champs and such, you fix the issues with the new client. 
ie; it changing to away if we don't have the client open as the main program we're using, status messages not saving, client not logging out when shut down through task manager, the lag (which is way more than expected - 10/20 seconds when out of game to see post game stats) when set to low-spec mode, etc.

{{champion:266}} You people made him worse, his to squishy and the passive now doesn't help with it everything else is alright 

just change his passive back and It'll be all sweet
{{champion:80}} Can't wait for the Dragonslayer Pantheon chroma to drop{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Add 2v2 magma chamber please.

{{champion:266}} What did you people do to Aatrox!!! I knew it would have been bad but this is outrageous the way his Blood Well is especially its so hard to maintain and get to. Aatrox is a character that I like to play when Im top or add (DON'T GET MAD PLEASE I MAKE IT WORK, SOMETHIMES), as a fun pick or when there is already a tank on the team and I play him pretty passively rather then just charging in all the time and when ever i would charge in and died the blood well was there and usually when I revived "Q" is usually there to help with an escape but now it's not because I can't maintain the blood well. It's good that you made him scale with ad more that would help with the laning phase a lot better and poking with his "E" I was happy to hear this because I would go with my ap runes for the early pokes. now could rant a bit more about how he was squishy before but now it's just a joke but I have school tomorrow and need some sleep.

If you guys could revert his blood well back it would do wonders for him and help out with that squishiness of his other then that his alright.
Hey can you make it so that casting Edge of Night doesn't interrupt your movement? Every time I cast it, I just stop moving for a fraction of a second and its really annoying.
Jax E effect is much clearer now. However I did get used to and liked his jerky AAs. Seems a little off now that its smoother
The "an" in the bugfix of Sion's q ruined my day.
